architectural_notes: Monthly totals should be computed as the sum of daily entries for the month and update immediately on tick/entry changes, following Steady Climb Year Plan rules (incl. handling of missing days and plank time aggregation).
known_issues: Monthly view shows incorrect values vs expected March totals (e.g., 30 squats/press-ups and 1:30 plank) — monthly totals not matching summed daily entries when ticked.

existing_features.title: Update the habit tracking logic so that for applicable habits (e.g., press-ups, squats, plank), the monthly target value for a given habit+month+year is always the sum of that habit’s daily completed entries in the same month+year, updating immediately after each tick/untick or amount edit.

Frontend: ensure the Monthly Targets view reflects the month/year the user is currently working in (the month selected in the Habits dashboard), and it displays the persisted computed monthly sum for each applicable habit for that same month/year.

new_feature_requests.summary: Fix monthly targets so they match (sum) daily entries immediately when ticked, for applicable habits (press-ups, squats, plank), following the Steady Climb Year Plan rules.
Backend: persist the computed monthly summed value per habit+month+year so that Monthly Targets always show the correct total after reload and across devices/sessions.

projectName: Make monthly targets equal summed daily completed amounts (Steady Climb rules)
